title: FitTracker
description: FitTracker is a web application that allows trainers to manage their clients, assign exercises, and track progress efficiently. The application supports adding clients, managing client details, and associating specific exercises with each client.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, JWT Spring Security, JavaScript, React.js, SQL.

title: GeoMyWish
description: 'GeoMyWish', allows users to create groups and manage shopping lists within those groups. Each group can have multiple shopping lists, and users can add, edit, and manage products within those lists, making it a collaborative tool for group-based shopping management.
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js

title: TinderBook
description: TinderBook is a server-side rendering application that allows users to connect with others based on shared interests, similar to Tinder but designed for book enthusiasts. Users can browse, like, and match with others based on their book preferences. Key Technologies: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, React, and JWT for user authentication.
technologies: JavaScript, Handlebars, CSS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB

title: Space Aircraft
description: Space-Aircraft is a web-based interactive game that allows players to control a spacecraft using simple arrow keys to avoid obstacles and navigate through space. The goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding collisions with incoming objects. Key Technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and HTML Canvas
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, HTML Canvas, GitHub Pages
